actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.
Reported to House from the Committee on Banking and Currency, H. Rept. 93-749.
Measure failed of passage in House, roll call #8 (155-248).

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Development Association.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States Governor to pay to the International Development Association $1,500,000,000 as the United States contribution to the Fourth Replentishment of the Resources of the Association. Authorizes to be appropriated $1,500,000,000 for payment by the Secretary of the Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Development Association.
